title: Sub board for Yasuo complaints?
body:
At any given time, theres always usually about 2 or 3 Yasuo complaints on the front page of the boards. (and its not just our server either)

There are more Yasuo posts than Esports or Community events posts, and they have their own sub boards.
So i propose we get a specific sub board just for Yasuo and his bs. 

Obviously Riot have no intention of listening to our queries about him, so its in their best interests as well to give us our own little corner for them to ignore.

So how about it? it is constantly one of the most talked about things on the boards.

replies.body: There should just be a sub board titled "Whiny little bitches post here". ;^)
Yes... Right next to the Yasuo sub board ;)
It's really just you that posts Yasuo complaints. Btw I played the "new Taliyah", it is much better this way IMO.

I comment a lot on them, but i don't often post them.

I would be fine with the new taliyah if when you cast it out of max range, it cast AT max range instead of making her walk.

Some abilities are one way and some are the other. 

Azir's soldiers for example, when cast out of max range, get cast AT max range instead of making him walk to the targeted location, I just wish Taliyah's W was the same.

Azir's W is like that because when an Azir wants to W-Q Riot gets that they just want a soldier out asap. I guess you could say the same for Taliyah's W, but you need to have it where you want it to go.

If you get a feel for the range of her W (which comes after playing a champ a few times), then you will use it a lot if it casts at max range.

But even if you know the max range off by heart, trying to put your cursor just on max range, is near impossible in a fight/chase/escape, so the way it is now, effectively gives it a shorter range, or makes it slower to cast.
Yasuo is nothing more than a fucking adc, get over it
